Prepare options for a portalcasting directory

Source: R/options.R
all_options.Rd

Suite of functions used to generate options lists:

all_options creates the full hierarchy of lists

dir_options creates a list of control options for the directory set-up

PortalData_options creates a list of options for filling the PortalData subdirectory

data_options creates a list of lists of options for filling the data subdirectory

moons_options creates a list of options for the moons data

rodents_options creates a list of options for the rodents data

covariates_options creates a list of options for the covariates data

metadata_options creates a list of options for the metadata creation

predictions_options creates a list of options for populating the predictions subdirectory

models_options creates a list of options for populating the models subdirectory

cast_options creates a list of control options for running portalcast

all_options(base = ".", main = "", subs = subdirs(), quiet = FALSE,
  fdate = today(), append_missing_to_raw = TRUE, m_save = TRUE,
  m_filename = "moons.csv", tmnt_type = NULL, start = 217,
  end = NULL, hind_step = 1, drop_spp = "PI", min_plots = 24,
  min_traps = 1, level = "Site", treatment = NULL, plots = "all",
  output = "abundance", r_save = TRUE, r_filename = "all.csv",
  cov_hist = TRUE, cov_fcast = TRUE, yr = as.numeric(format(today(),
  "%Y")), lead_time = 12, min_lag = 6, fcast_nms = NULL,
  nfcnm = 0, append_fcast_csv = TRUE,
  hist_fcast_file = "covariate_forecasts.csv",
  source_name = "current_archive", c_save = TRUE,
  c_filename = "covariates.csv", cast_type = "forecasts",
  confidence_level = 0.9, meta_save = TRUE,
  meta_filename = "metadata.yaml",
  download_existing_predictions = FALSE, model = models(),
  ensemble = TRUE, version = "latest", from_zenodo = TRUE)

dir_options(base = ".", main = "", subs = subdirs(), quiet = FALSE)

PortalData_options(base = ".", main = "", subs = subdirs(),
  quiet = FALSE, version = "latest", from_zenodo = TRUE)

data_options(base = ".", main = "", subs = subdirs(),
  quiet = FALSE, fdate = today(), append_missing_to_raw = TRUE,
  m_save = TRUE, m_filename = "moons.csv", tmnt_type = NULL,
  start = 217, end = NULL, hind_step = 1, drop_spp = "PI",
  min_plots = 24, level = "Site", treatment = NULL, plots = "all",
  output = "abundance", r_save = TRUE, r_filename = "all.csv",
  cov_hist = TRUE, cov_fcast = TRUE, yr = as.numeric(format(today(),
  "%Y")), lead_time = 12, min_lag = 6, fcast_nms = NULL,
  nfcnm = 0, append_fcast_csv = TRUE,
  hist_fcast_file = "covariate_forecasts.csv",
  source_name = "current_archive", c_save = TRUE,
  c_filename = "covariates.csv", cast_type = "forecasts",
  confidence_level = 0.9, meta_save = TRUE,
  meta_filename = "metadata.yaml")

moons_options(n_future_moons = 12, fdate = today(),
  append_missing_to_raw = TRUE, save = TRUE, filename = "moons.csv",
  tree = dirtree(), quiet = FALSE)

rodents_options(cast_type = "forecasts", tmnt_type = NULL,
  start = 217, end = NULL, hind_step = 1, drop_spp = "PI",
  min_plots = 24, level = "Site", treatment = NULL, plots = "all",
  output = "abundance", save = TRUE, filename = "all.csv",
  tree = dirtree(), quiet = FALSE)

covariates_options(cast_type = "forecasts", cov_hist = TRUE,
  cov_fcast = TRUE, fdate = today(), yr = as.numeric(format(today(),
  "%Y")), start = 217, end = NULL, hind_step = 1, lead_time = 12,
  min_lag = 6, fcast_nms = NULL, nfcnm = 0,
  append_fcast_csv = TRUE, hist_fcast_file = "covariate_forecasts.csv",
  source_name = "current_archive", save = TRUE,
  filename = "covariates.csv", tree = dirtree(), quiet = FALSE)

metadata_options(fdate = today(), cast_type = "forecasts",
  confidence_level = 0.9, lead_time = 12, save = TRUE,
  filename = "metadata.yaml", quiet = FALSE, tree = dirtree())

predictions_options(base = ".", main = "", subs = subdirs(),
  download_existing_predictions = FALSE, quiet = FALSE)

models_options(base = ".", main = "", subs = subdirs(),
  quiet = FALSE, model = models())

cast_options(base = ".", main = "", subs = subdirs(),
  quiet = FALSE, model = models(), cast_type = "forecasts",
  fdate = today(), ensemble = TRUE, start = 217, end = NULL,
  hind_step = 1, min_plots = 24, min_traps = 1)

Arguments

base

name of the base directory where the forecasting directory should exist (will be created if it doesn't)
main

name of the portalcasting directory
subs

names of the portalcasting subdirectories
quiet

logical indicator if progress messages should be quieted
fdate

date from which future is defined, typically today's date.
append_missing_to_raw

logical indicating if the missing moon dates should be appended to the raw data file (should be TRUE to allow the imported portalr functions to work properly)
m_save

logical if the moons data should be saved out
m_filename

the name of the file for saving moons data
tmnt_type

"all" or "controls"
start

newmoon number of the first sample to be included. Default value is 217, corresponding to 1995-01-01
end

newmoon number of the last sample to be included. Default value is NULL, which equates to the most recently included sample. If cast_type is "hindcasts" and end is NULL, default becomes 490:403, corresponding to 2017-01-01 back to 2010-01-01
hind_step

an iteration parameter to work across the input values for end. Default is 1, which is likely all it should be run using
drop_spp

species names to drop from the table
min_plots

minimum number of plots surveyed for a survey to be used
min_traps

minimum number of traps trapped for a plot to be used
level

for get_rodent_data, automatically set by tmnt_type
treatment

for get_rodent_data, automatically set by tmnt_type
plots

for get_rodent_data, automatically set by tmnt_type
output

for get_rodent_data, automatically set by tmnt_type
r_save

logical if the data should be saved out
r_filename

the name of the file to save the rodent data in
cov_hist

logical indicator whether or not historical covariates are to be included
cov_fcast

logical indicator whether or not forecasted covariates are to be included
yr

year of today
lead_time

number of moons into the future the rodents are forecast
min_lag

the minimum lag time used in any model
fcast_nms

newmoon numbers to be forecast for covariates
nfcnm

number of forecast newmoons for covariates
append_fcast_csv

logical if the new forecast should be appended to the historical forecasts for the purposes of hindcasting
hist_fcast_file

name of the file where the historical covariate forecasts are held
source_name

character value for the name to give the covariaate forecast. Currently is "current_archive". Previous to "current_archive", the data were retroactively filled in and are given the source name "retroactive"
c_save

logical if the covariate data should be saved out
c_filename

the name of the covariate file for the saving
cast_type

"forecasts" or "hindcasts"
confidence_level

confidence level used in summarizing model output
meta_save

logical if the metadata should be saved out
meta_filename

the name of the metadata file for the saving
download_existing_predictions

logical indicator is the existing predictions files should be retrieved from the portalPredictions repo
model

names of model scripts to include
ensemble

logical indicator of whether to create an ensemble model
version

version number or "latest" (default) for the Portal Data download
from_zenodo

logical indicator of whether or not the Portal Data should come from Zenodo (come from GitHub if not)
n_future_moons

integer value for the number of future moons to add
save

logical if the specific data should be saved out
filename

the name of the file for the saving
tree

directory tree

Value

all_options: list of control options lists ("options_dir" generated by dir_options, "options_PortalData" generated by PortalData_options, "options_data" generated by data_options, "options_predictions" generated by predictions_options, "options_models" generated by models_options, and "options_cast" generated by cast_options.

dir_options: a list of settings controlling the directory structure creation

PortalData_options: a list of settings controlling the creation and population of the PortalData subdirectory

data_options: list of control options lists ("moons" generated by moons_options, "rodents" generated by rodents_options, "covariates" generated by covariates_options, and "metadata" generated by metadata_options, as well as items "cast_type", "tree", and "quiet" for simple use with all or ancillary data.

moons_options: a list of settings controlling the moon data creation

rodents_options: a list of settings controlling the rodents data creation

covariates_options: a list of settings controlling the covariates data creation

metadata_options: a list of settings controlling the metadata creation

predictions_options: a list of settings controlling the population of the predictions subdirectory

models_options: a list of settings controlling the population of the models subdirectory

cast_options: a list of settings controlling the running of portalcast

Contents

  • Arguments
  • Value
